scripts.build: gulp build && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml && npx pagefind
scripts.build:jekyll: gulp build && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.start: yarn run build && bundle exec jekyll serve --baseurl ''
scripts.start:storybook-static: export STORYBOOK_ENV=8080 && yarn run build && bundle exec jekyll serve --baseurl ''
scripts.watch: yarn run build && bundle exec jekyll serve --baseurl '' --incremental
scripts.update-releases: rm -rf json_data_cache && yarn run build && bundle exec jekyll serve --baseurl ''
scripts.build-json: gulp move-json-data && gulp process-component-maturity && gulp process-component-maturity-figma
